mapper.select: select DISTINCT d.Id,d.bar_code,d.commodity_unit,d.sku,d.commodity_decimal,d.purchase_decimal,d.wholesale_decimal,d.low_decimal from jzh_material_extend d where d.material_id = #{materialId} and ifnull(d.delete_Flag,'0') !='1' order by d.default_flag desc,d.id asc
mapper.update: update jzh_material_extend set purchase_decimal = #{purchaseDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, commodity_decimal = #{commodityDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, wholesale_decimal = #{wholesaleDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, low_decimal = #{lowDecimal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1'
